column10: Easy to "install" and remove (unlike trying to get an Otterbox off), looks great, not too bulky, and there's not even a scratch on it yet. The buttons aren't too stiff. Very happy with this purchase overall.
Good, high quality case.  A little pricier than some of its competition, but I have no complaints about the case itself.

column9: manly yes, but I like it too!
column10: it's nice & sturdy without being too bulky.Slippery enough to slide into a pocket, but with enough texture that it doesn't slide off the car console.  Perfect for my husband!
Good case and really affordable too comparing to the ones in the Apple Store. I dropped my new iPhone 5S a few times right after I bought this. Glad I did!
This case is amazing, the design is so much better than otterbox. I ordered a second one for my sister.

Love the case...very nice looking, lots of compliments from others...have not dropped it so I don't know how well the overall protection.It fits well in my hand and so far, it's been great.  no problem with scratches.  Would recommend to others..

This case met all my expectations. It fit my phone perfectly.  It combines sleekness and toughness in one package.  I have dropped my phone a few times and this case protected it as well as I was hoping it would.

I bought this for the iPhone 5.  The case is very thin and light if you like that sort of thing.  I personally found that the phone with this case didn't feel "substantial" enough, so I actually bought a heavier case that I prefer.  But if you like the minimalist thing, then this will be a good case for you.  On the downside, the hard backing is actually pretty flimsy and pops off without too much effort.  I think the name "tough armor" is misleading.  Fits nice and snug on the phone though, so there's that.

column9: Exactly what I was looking for in an iPhone case
column10: This is exactly what I was looking for in an iPhone case.  Tough enough to protect it against the occasional accident, but slim enough that I can easily slip it in and out of my pocket.  It looks sharp, too.In addition, I have also received several unsolicited compliments on the case.  People will notice it and ask me if they can take a look at it.

Conforms to phone well.  Quality feel, craftsmanship, sophisticated look.  I disagree with reviews that case is too slippery in hand.  I also disagree with reviews that contend this is an otterbox killer.  It is notably thinner than an otterbox defender and not as thoroughly protective, with only a beveled edge to protect the front screen and a thin back cover.  The best protection is on the corners.  However this case is more aesthetically pleasing than any otterbox case.  The gold color matches the phone perfectly.  The gold portion accumulates slight scratches but it does not excessively detract from overall appearance.  The tactile feedback from the power buttons and volume controls is very good.  Some reviewers may wish to know the cutout at the bottom of the phone is large enough to accomodate the Apple lightning-to-30-pin connector cable for those that need to connect to 30-pin stereo docks, old chargers, car stereos, etc.  I have dropped the phone in the case from waist height onto hardwood and it did not sustain any apparent damage.  Nonetheless, 4 stars because I still have some trepidation about the case protecting against hard falls or heavy wear-and-tear.  Balancing the numerous pros and minor cons, I would buy this case again.
Love his case. Feels really good in the hand. I feel really confident that it Won't damage my phine if I drop it. Looks great on my gold iphone.
Great case, matched the new iPhone 5S perfectly.  Highly recommend it to someone who wants to protect an investment. Spigen makes a good quality product.  Definitely a winner
Fits tight. great angles on the case make the phone easy to grip and hard to drop. Easy to use all the buttons and plugs.The gold matches perfectly. Very, very nice and high-quality.
Great case for the 5s.  I have had it for a month and I has done a great job protecting it during multiple drops (not advised).
excellent cover protects but not too bulky. Very classy and slick design. Would order again when another one is needed

column9: Excellent case, great value, highly recommend.
column10: Excellent case, and by far the best value for money.  I have one on my iphone 5s and have found it to be ideal.  It's protective enough that it has survived a couple of drops onto hard surfaces that would have broken the phone without a case, yet slim enough that it doesn't detract from the overall iphone experience.  My daughter has one too after I convinced her that her old case just wasn't going to cut it, given how often she drops things.  Highly recommend this case.  I've owned otterbox cases before and they are so much bulkier than these Spigen cases that it isn't a fair comparison.  I don't believe otterbox cases provide any more protection except that the screen is protected from water.
It a high quality product. I use it with my iPhone so somebody asked me how much you buy and When I told them they were surprised because the price I bough is cheaper than what they think.

The case looks fantastic on my phone.i only have one bad thing to say about the case. That one thing is that the back can easily get scratched up. Other than that, it's perfect!!!! It's by far my favorite case that I have purchased! This is coming from someone who works at Sprint and sees phone cases all day long. I'd recommend it for sure.Thanks for reading
The best cover so far. It is no otterbox but if you want a cover that isn't thick and clunky but still protects the phone, look no further.

column9: Great Value, Overall a Reliable Case
column10: I ordered this case mainly because I wanted something relatively inexpensive that would still keep my phone safe. In that respect, I got exactly what I wanted. It fits the phone perfectly, and the protection is fantastic. The case has a very appealing design, and hardly thickens the dimensions of my phone at all. The only issue that I've had with it is that I need to remove the case to plug it in to my car stereo, which only takes a second. Very satisfied!
I have always gotten Otterbox cases and decided to get this one. It is just grippy enough to grab and not snag when getting it out if your pocket. Very thin but still will protect your phone.
dropped my new iphone 5s on the ceramic tile flood just after i put in in the case no problems!

I like that this case fits tight and isn't bulky but it is a little slippery to hold. I hate the Otter box that may be great protection but are thick and bulky. This case is slim and goes in and out of your pocket easily. I just wish it had a texture that felt more secure in my hand.
So far, good. I was at ATT store today and they had never seen one yet. The shared it with all the reps! They all liked it! Sell on!

This case is the the best by far ! Love it. You have to get one. I need to get more colors my self.  But they really should have thought about cancer awareness. Pink case with a red ends with the red symbol  and should be $20 with half going towards cancer.

This is an awesome case. I have dropped my phone more than once and there has been zero damage to my phone. I am very happy with this product. I wish there were more colors for the plate other than the 3 offered. Still this is an amazing case. Only one drawback, it won't take the 30 pin adapter but a simple mod fixes this.
Honestly, I didn't expect it to be so good and handy. I am really happy with the product and its a great value for money.
It's neat, clean, streamlined and classy. A perfect fit. It makes my 5s look great while protecting it. I love it!
I love this case, probably my favorite case i have ever owned.  can easily get out of my pocket but also doesnt slide everywhere in the car

I've had about at least 50 cases in my lifetime and this by far is the best one I've owned. I was using an otter box commuter case but still felt like it was too big for me. This case provides the same type of protection and is a lot more slimmer. Very happy and would buy it over and over again!

column9: Appears well made, offers good protection
column10: Bought this for my 5s.  Previously had an Otterbox on my old phone, which protected phone from falls but made the phone too bulky.  This product appears to offer the best protection while still keeping a fairly slim profile.  My only complaint is that the colors offered are a little boring (white, black, gray, gold, yawn).  The bottom of the phone is not covered, so the Amazon generic charging cord works great with it.

The case is exactly how it looks in the photos and fits my iPhone 5s snugly. It's also really nice that it is screen protector friendly and doesn't peel up the edges like a lot of cases will. I definitely recommend it if you're looking for a case that isn't bulky.

A very good looking case, with a slim, precision fit.  Some mention the edges are sharp, but for me, they're well defined.  The surfaces of both the back and the other areas have a grippy texture which conveys a premium feel.  The buttons work well.  It took a while to get used to the power being recessed, but it's easy to find by touch and not easily depressed by accident.  The bottom cutouts are cleanly defined and precise.  I like the elevated edge on the front that protects the screen.  I also have a spigen screen protector that's a perfect fit as well.  I've only had it for a few weeks, but protection seems to be very good and so far, no scuffs or scratches.

Love the Case, after buying cheap cases. it was worth spending the money. great quality, light, protects, and still sleek. Its not big and bulky at all. It doesn't feel cheap. It really changes your phone on the way it looks and how it feels.

I bought this for my husband after purchasing the iPhone 5s. I've purchased a lot of classes since I've started with the iPhone 3 back in the days ;) and without a doubt, Spigen makes some of the best cases I've owned. This was no exception. I bought the slate for his silver phone. Doesn't add any bulk but has great protection. Seems to serve what bulky otter box does for phones. My husband works at the hospital so really likes that he can clean his case every day with a Clorox wipe when he comes home and it doesn't damage the case or make it old looking. My only regret is that thy didn't make something like this for the iPhone 4S which I am still rocking. It's hard to give up 64GB! Would buy this case again if and when I upgrade.

The case is very nice, much slimmer than the otterbox I had before.  But seems like it will provide good protection to my phone.  I really like the design of the case and the way it fits.  The only thing I would like to see is a belt clip holster designed for this case so I don't have to keep it in my pocket.

This is a nice high quality case that's amazingly thin.  I have not tested it by dropping it but it feels as substantial as my prior otter box commuter.  The description claims corner protection which was the downfall of the otterbox when my screen shattered on my 4s from a corner impact.  If my 5s drops, I am confident that this will perform as well as the otter box commuter.
Might not be the most stylish case ever but it protects extremely well with a relatively low profile design. I've dropped the phone dozens of times and it's still perfect!
This Case is great, it offers great protection and is still slim enough that I can slide my phone in my pocket.
love this case. not bulky at all, retains the look of the actual iphone 5s too. i dropped it the first day i had it and it didn't even scuff that much. so awesome for butter fingers!

This is a great case and after seeing the reviews and watching videos about it, I had to have it! It is durable like it says and I dropped my phone about five times already and the phone is still in perfect condition! The reason I'm giving it four stars rather than five is, I've dropped my phone five times because the case is so slick and it just slips right out of my hand! If they put some type of rubber or something to keep the phone from sliding right out of your hand, this would definately be the case to have! After two weeks of this case I broke down and got the otterbox defender even though it's bulky, but I know it won't slip out of my hand!

column9: It feels just like an iPhone...
column10: It feels like an iPhone without a case in my hand, but it has a case.  Weird I know, it's just a little thicker.  The quality of material, fit, and finish make this case feel as high quality as the phone itself. The buttons look great and work nice and easy. I feel confident in its protection and it looks great. I go through 5-10 cases with each phone and this is by far the best one I've ever had, for any phone.Please know that the silicone/rubber part of the case is hard. Almost as hard as the plastic back. This is one of the reasons it feels like a naked iPhone in the hand and I happen to love that. Also the case hasn't been the best in keeping a new look, I don't mind as it's a fair price for a quality case.
Excellent product. Better than expected. Very happy I chose this one and it serves as great protection for my phone.

column9: Nice phone case for the price
column10: Verizon tries to hard sell accessories with every phone upgrade. I got a much better case at much lower cost here on amazon for my 5s. Pretty happy with the case so far. It's been six weeks and I'm still happy with my purchase of a SPIGEN Tough Armor Case. My only complaint is that i wish the audio/charge jacks were covered.  Price 5/5 Quality 4.5/5 (no jack covers)
Solid, durable and good looking.Bought it for about 18$ . Work as a carpenter and never had a problem so far. Stays tight and fit !!
I am satisfied with this case on my iPhone 5s.  It's very comfortable and light also looks great on my phone.

I just got this case for my shiny new iPhone 5s yesterday.  I'm very impressed with it. Well made, slick design, slim profile but still great protection, fits perfectly and snugly, made out of high quality materials.  It is a little more 'stiff' than other similar cases, but the material is still pliable. It's very easy to install.  I do wish that the product packaging was a little more eco-friendly (It's packaged in a large hard plastic case - Should've been in some kind of small cardboard sleeve or something).One thing to note - Some other reviews have said that the side bumper materials are not 'rubbery' like they had hoped. Well, the sides are definitely not made of rubber and are not 'soft', but they are coated in that kind of rubberized plastic so it gives a good grip in your hand and on the surfaces so it doesn't slide around.  So it's not any kind of slick material or anything, but it's also not 'gummy', it's somewhere in-between.Overall a great case that I highly recommend.

This case came fast and as described. This case seems very sturdy and fits great on my 5s. It not only protects great but it looks very nice and the design is cool and sleek. I have had otter box defenders on my other iPhones and, while also a great case, I am much more satisfied with this one. With the otter box my phone would over heat and the head phone jack covers annoyed me, with this case I have neither of those issues. I never leave long reviews but this product was good to me so  doing some good back. If you are on the fence about getting this case buy it, once you get it you won't ever need another case. The only thing this case isn't is water proof. I also hope they start selling the colored back panels by the selfs because then you could mix it up. All in all very satisfied with this awesome case!

I previously had the Otterbox Commuter on my iPhone 4S but wanted something slimmer with *similar* (not necessarily identical) protection.  I think this Spigen case is a LOT more attractive and seems fine from a protection standpoint.  At this point, however, I have not dropped my 5S (like what regularly happened with my 4S).
Excellent product! Exactly what I was looking for. Very protective while maintaining a very sleek look. Not super bulky like the otter box.

I was pleased with the sturdiness of this case, as well as its slim profile.  However it added considerable weight to the device and was quite uncomfortable to hold in your hand due to its hard, straight edges.

After reading a lot of reviews, I was a little wary that this case my feel a bit too slippery, but it was anything but. It feels great in the hand rigid protection, but with a rubbery give in all the right places for how I hold a phone. It adds almost no bulk or weight to the phone, yet it has a raised edge for the front, and the buttons are protected. The back hard cover is removable, so I hope that means they will offer a variety of color replacement covers in the future. I adore this case.
Do not like the construction. But it does what it is suppose to. I prefer a rubber case. I will keep for awhile
This case rocks. I like the thin profile that it offers compared to the that of the OtterBox. I will be grabbing another for my wife.

This case seems well made and fits my new iPhone 5s perfectly.  I like the look and feel of the case.  It fits in my hand very comfortably and protects my phone.  I recommend it.

I'm glad a friend told me about this case. It seems it has a much better protective quality than 95% of the others out there. It very sharp looking and does not add that much bulk to the phone. I can easily slip the phone in and out of my pants pockets without getting hung up. You will need to get a screen protector though. For every day use it's great. I also bought an Otterbox Defender but I think I will only be using it when I am in an outdoor non-urban environment like the desert.

This 'Tough Armor' case was a very pleasant surprise, having used both the Lifeproof and Otterbox on previous iPhones I did not want something that felt cheep. I liked the look of this one, the size and price, so I took a chance. The case consists of two pieces A hard yet flexible  inner shell and a metal outer that acts as a clamp to keep the sides nicely fit into the sides (something most silicone cases don't do). I use this case with an Invisible shield by ZAGG, and it's a perfect match. Would definitely recommend this for design and value.
Really like this case due to low profile, color scheme and protective qualities. Looks good with what you can see of the space grey color.
I'm very happy with the Spigen Tough Armor case. The aesthetics are very clean and the quality it top notch. Will seek out Spigen cases for future phones.

column9: Like the look and feel of the case

I love a case that fits this well to the phone & keeps everything slender so it is still close to design.  It feels very solid and has succeeded in surviving my 4th beer drop test :)

This is one great case! Like this alot better than the Otterbox case I had for a previous iPhone. Not bulky at all. Fits the 5S perfectly! Hadn't had any issues with the back scratching yet.

I like it. I ordered this directly from Spigen for my iPhone 5s, very high quality. The phone fits quite snugly, you would not really want to take it out every day to fit into a dock or what not, but I don't need to do that.  just use the charge and sync cable.

It comes in two parts, the rubbery/plastic part that fits and clips around the phone, then you add the plastic backing to the rubbery part, locking it in place, and thus it will stay on without a problem. It doesn't really feel much like rubber. It doesn't grip too much (like in a pocket). Feels great in your hand, and looks great too

Realistically, this should be a three and a half star review. On the whole, I like this case very very much. The back plate (slate in my case) is hard plastic, I wasn't sure when I bought it if it was supposed to be plastic or aluminum, probably I just didn't read thoroughly enough. The other, primary piece of the case is a softer plastic, it is in no way something I would call rubber though, but still flexes enough that I feel like it will be an acceptable shock absorber. The case also looks really slick.My gripe is with the gap for the headphone jack. To get pretty much any 1/8' audio connecter into that jack, requires jamming it in hard enough to cause the plastic of the case to bow out slightly. So in the end it works, especially since I have to jam the cord into the jack really hard without the case on (that makes me nervous, Apple), but I'm not wild about it. I think the plastic is flexible enough to hold up to this kind of use/abuse, but time will tell.

column9: Scratches against soft surfaces, very slippery
column10: Bought if for the looks and decent price.  Day 1, I have two observations:1 - this thing slides... very problematic if you like to lay flat in the car2 - (day1) This case has been in my pocket / protected most of the day and is scratched up more than my 2 year old prior case...

Although I haven't dropped my phone yet to really test this case, I love everything else about it! Looks great, not bulky like my Otter Box case and helps keep the original look and feel of the iPhone :) Will probably buy more colors!
This is a great case! My husband and I both bought one. I dropped the phone once on concrete and it was completely protected the phone!

Just for the record, I've always used an 'otterbox',because, I trust them, despite the bulkiness. Now, I have an iphone (iphone5s), and my really good friend recommended this case to me. It does give great protection (so far), and I am enamored with the fact that the case size isn't bulky or anything of that sort. It keeps its sleek and slender appeal.

column9: great case, good feel to the touch
column10: At first i thought this case would be entirely plastic but its only the backing. it has a silicone or rubber type material on the lining.  This actually feels nice and gives a bit of a grip but my only concern is how it will hold up over time. the otterbox liners are great in the beginning but after a few months you can see and feel the wear. they soften up and get discolored and bent out of shape. i hope this one really holds over time.Also i was a tad disappointed that the rubber parts near the ports werent as sturdy. they flex a bit especially when you put the phone in your pocket and try to pull it out, I feel like i am constantly stretching the bottom part and it might bend out of shape later (my otterbox commuter did this).  im worried that the bottom part will become soft and flimsy. i guess only time will tell and i have made a conscious effort to try to pull the phone out of my pocket by the edges.  I only gave it 4 stars because of this. id give it a 5 if it were perfect and hard all around.The edges over the top and side are very nice and firm and that i love.I was also disappointed that it did not come with a screen protector. i read a few reviews that some users got screen and home button protectors. incipio and otter always include them. its cheap and i think it would be a nice thing to do

column9: Best all around case I found
column10: I just got the iphone 5s and I needed a case. I bought 5-6 cases of various prices and levels of protection. The tough armor blows away all the other cases that I purchased. This case is very slim. It also seems to offer a good protection. I have only used the case for about a week. So far I have experienced no problems. I have not dropped the phone. But I had I did watch a demonstration on dropping the phone with this case on rocks and it seem to hold up very well. This case is slim and very formfitting to the iPhone. Very high quality. Very form fitting. I wish I had saved my money and just bought this one.I also bought the spigen tempered glass screen protector this is a great addition to the case well worth the money.
Tough case, slim and very protective. Definitely would recommend this product . Took my tech 21 case off for this case love it .

I purchased the Spigen Tough Armor (slate blue) after looking at the Otterbox cases for my 5S.  I prefer a good balance between small size and protection.  I think the Spigen Tough Armor fits that bill.  The case is sizable enough that it feels sturdy when I put my phone down on a table, and yet it is still small enough to fit into my front pocket in my jeans.Any smaller, and then it is too much compromise on the protection.Any larger, and then it won't fit into a pocket nicely.The power and volume button covers feel sturdy, too.  It takes a little more effort to hit the power button which, as it turns out, is actually a nice advantage here - no more accidental power-ons when I go to pick up my phone.I assume the case will show signs of wear over time, but that is to be expected.The case does provide a bit of a lip on the front, so that you can put your phone down on its face and the glass does not touch the table.  The case also does not interfere with screen protectors.Best part is that the case does not look like it was only $25.  Much cheaper than Otterbox, imo.

I was looking for a protective case for new iPhone 5s that would fit in my pocket well.  Wife has an iPhone 5 with Otterbox Defender case, and while it provides nice protection, it is bulky and very difficult to get in and out of your pocket.  This cover is very sturdy and I can I say I have already dropped my new phone once or twice and it has done a great job of protecting it.  The case is a little scratched now, but the iphone is just fine.  I would recommend this if you are looking for a slim and protective case.  This case does not provide protection from the elements, nor dust, as all of the ports and jacks are open.  However, if you don't plan on taking your iPhone camping or something then this is a great case.
Case was received quickly and in excellent order!  Works very well and provides good protection for my phone investment.  I have dropped the phone several times and the case has worked like a charm!

I ordered this item 2 weeks ago. When I was viewing this item, it says it takes 5-7 days for shipping. But after I placed the order, it is one month after the date of purchase! Who can avoid this?) If I can receive this case earlier, that wouldn't be the case! If you love your phone, DO NOT BUY IT!
Quality iPhone case, I couldn't ask for more. This case fits and protects perfectly without taking away from the original iPhone look.

I know that I made a good decision.  This case has a modern functional design and works as an extension.  I use this phone/case all the time for work, travel, and anything else  I have already dropped my phone more than 8 times (please don't report this  to my service provider) from different angles and heights without any case issues or phone issues. This case deserves it's 5 star rating.
Got this case for my new iPhone 5s and couldn't be happier! Already dropped it on asphalt and not a scratch! Also it's very sleek and not bulky. Sorry Otterbox, I'll never be back.

column9: Best case I've had for a phone
column10: Buttons are responsive, tight fit... I feel safe if I drop my phone nowSleek look that accentuates my phone

I needed something that can act like an otter box, but doesn't make my phone a brick.  I'm old enough to have had an actual brick cell phone, and one of the benefits of technology should be us not having to go back there.This case is sleek, stylish, and does the trick.  I haven't done any crazy drops off stairs or anything, but I dropped it on day two from about 4 feet with no damage.  Very satisfied with all parts of this case.  Very easy to install.I noticed someone else called it the Otterbox Killer...I concur.
Fits great, feels great. Exactly as advertised and I like it better than my old otterbox. Just wish it came in more color options

column9: Best iPhone Case I've Ever Used
column10: This is probably the most well-designed iPhone case I’ve ever used. The lip around the screen provides the perfect amount of distance for the iPhone to sit on a table without risking the screen touching. I have reduced my review to 4 stars because the headphone jack will not fit perfectly with the aux cable in my car, requiring me to file down the lip around the plug. All in all, very slick looking and feeling case.

The Tough Armor seems to be just what we wanted for our new iPhone 5s'. The case is very slim in profile, about the same as one of the original Bumpers Apple gave out. The SpiGen though is made of much tougher material that should not tear, and it has air pockets at each corner and a full back with openings for the camera and the insignia. The buttons operate as easily as on the phone itself, including the silent switch, and the opening at the bottom is big enough to allow any lightning cables I own. The feel of the case is smooth without being slippery and it is quite easy to pull in and out of my pocket.  No incidents yets by which to judge the protective capability but it would look to be at least as good as the Otterbox Defender without the bulk, which is what several testers wrote leading me to purchase this case. Time will tell.

column9: Nice Durable Case without the Bulk.
column10: I've owned both Griffin and Otterbox for ultimate protection, but was looking for something a bit slimmed down. The only down side was loosing the built in front protector, so it may not be a fair true comparison. Either way I took care of this with a GadgetShieldz protector. Between the two it's just what I was looking for.After the arrival of my case my wife and nephew then wanted the same. This is the type of product that sells itself. The only flaw that I see with the case is the metal back wanting to separate from the rubber towards the top where they meet. Other than that it's really an attractive, well thought out case at a fair price. It's got a great grip, buttons are reasonably easy to press and simple to clean. Fits the 5S perfect.

column9: Sturdy, easy to put on case.
column10: The case is rugged and slipped onto the phone easily. My hand is on the smallish side and I find it less comfortable to hold than the flexible Otter Box case I had on my iPhone 4S. The Spigen's edges are on the front where my fingers curve around the case are a bit sharp and I miss the rubbery feeling of the Otter. The button covers do their job and I have no "connection" problems when I press them. The case seems sturdy enough to protect the phone should (or should I say when) I drop it.

column9: Good mix of benefits w/no drawbacks
column10: I've tried 3 cases so far and I finally found the one. It's a good looking case, small in size while protecting the phone. Definitely a good mix of benefits. It doesn't hide the connections ports at the bottom. I hate having to open and close those on cases. It even fits in my leather hip carrying case that I already owned for an old blackberry. Love it!
Love everything about this case, the fit, finish and quality exceeded my expectations. I wish I could find one for my sons 4s.

This was a great case for the money. It's nice and slim and lighter than a otter box. If your very prone to dropping your phone every five minutes then this may not be for you. If you need some protection from the occasional drop then this case is for you.

I absolutely love this case!  I got it for my brand new iPhone 5S.  This case provides a lot of protection, while maintaining the sleek appearance of the iPhone.  I love how the colors of the case are very similar to the appearance of the phone itself.  It almost looks like my phone does not have a case at all.  I had an OtterBox previously, but I hated how bulky it looked.  This Spigen case is very comparable in terms of protection and looks so much better than the OtterBox.  Everyone who has seen my phone thinks this is the best case.  It is so sleek and so protective.  I am a klutz and frequently drop my phone.  After 3 weeks of having this case on my phone, I have had no scratches or a shattered screen.  It is also half the cost of an OtterBox.  It is a great purchase.  I definitely recommend this case!

I purchased this case in advance of receiving my new 5S.  I just received the phone two days ago.  While the case looks awesome, due to the sharp edges in the design, it is very uncomfortable to hold.  Also, the hard plastic is very slick.  Finally, just from putting the phone in and out of my shirt picket for two days, the back of the case has noticeable scratches.  Otter box is much more comfortable and durable (and includes a screen protector, which this does not.  The included home button suckers are of no use for the 5s

column9: Bought it as a cheap interim case
column10: I really wasn't expecting much out of the case, however it fits the iPhone 5S perfectly, and it is a very rugged case. The tolerances between the hard plastic shell and the tpu is fantastic. Everything transitions smoothly and fits together perfectly. I have had other cases that didn't quite fit, and would tend to warp near the middle of the screen. The TPU is hard and flexible, it doesn't get stock in your pocket like other silicone cases. It also seems flexible enough to protect against major drops, which I have experienced several times already. The only thing I wish is that it was waterproof, but... well it isn't supposed to be so that doesn't really matter.
I love the sleek design of this product.  I've already dropped my iPhone5 at least a couple of times since it's been encased with this Tough Armor Case.  I have zero complaints.

My new Tough Armor case fits my new 5s just right.  The case is surprisingly light and low-profile.  It has every appearance of being highly engineered and very protective.  I feel that this case is a terrific value as compared to some other more expensive ones.
It's a solid knife with a smooth open. I love it and it the shipping was early by a day! Got to love it!
I love this case. It's light weight and yet feels sturdy in your hand. I've already dropped my phone and the case protected it just the way it was advertised!

column9: Love the case, wish I could get the 5c version
column10: I love the form factor of this case. It's made of a really nice material that feels good in your hands and protects the phone really well without adding too much bulk. I've owned a number of iPhones and iPhone cases and this is by far my favorite in look and feel. My only complaint is that I wish I could get the 5c version of this case instead as I think the apple logo viewing windows that a lot of cases feature are stupid and pointless and it's a bit off-putting that this has that. I don't feel the need to show off to everyone that I'm using an apple product. If they come out with a newer version for the 5/5s that is identical to the 5c version then I will happily buy this case again to get rid of the pointless and distracting window. I realize that this issue won't bother everyone though so I still rate it five stars.

I purchased the Black Tough Armor Case for my new black iPhone 5S.  In case you have a 5S and are wondering, yes it does fit.  Spigen did a good job in the fit and feel of the product and it looks really good on the phone.  All the connections are open and the camera and flash don't have anything hindering their operation.  All in all, a great case for the money when you consider what other comparable cases will cost. I am very satisfied and would make this purchase again, but have a feeling that I won't need to for quite a long time.

column9: Nice case, edges could be a problem
column10: Nice case, slipped on to the 5S well and felt tight enough to stay on but not so tight to possibly be a problem. One thing is the edges are molded plastic and while they are not 'sharp' they tend to dig into the skin a little bit during one handed operation. Not a real big deal but coming from the 4 I find one handed operation already to be a little harder and this adds to annoyance factor somewhat. After a couple of weeks of use, including one plane trip, the case still looks brand new.Everything they tout about the case in the product description is true. It seems like a good case all around. I'm not going to do a drop test but it looks like it will protect the phone just fine.

This case is very protective, while providing minimal bulk. It does not impede the charge port or the headphone jack in any way and works with 3rd party chargers and headphones without having to be removed.My only qualm with it however is that the on/off button is a little difficult to push so if you're used to easily clicking it you'll find yourself having to readjust your grip on the phone the achieve the right leverage to be able to press it with one hand.

column9: Awesome simple" case for my iPhone 5"
column10: I read other reviews about this case...and was sold on the promotion video!I have placed my iPhone 5 in this case since it arrived and am very please with the looks and functionality of it all.  I have NOT dropped it, to test its durabilty...I don't plan to anytime soon, either!This is a great simple case foryour iPhone!I highly recommend it!

pros:small profile - does not add a lot of bulk to the iPhone.snug fit - I like how the case fits snugly reducing the risk of the phone coming out during a fall.rigid material - unlike the otterbox defender that I had, this material keeps its shape and does not stretch out over time.rubbery feel - even thought it is more rigid, it still has a rubbery feel so that it doesn't slip out of you hand easily.protection with function - I feel confident that if I drop the phone it will not sustain damage.  Functionally, I can access the power and headphone ports along with the mute switch without having to open the case or remove any flaps.cons:no belt clip - I wish that it came with some sort of snap on belt clip to carry it on my side like I could with my otterbox defender.no screen protector - I wish that a matte finish screen protector had been included with the case so I didn't have to purchase it separately.

column9: Best case out there for iPhone 5/5S!
column10: Really a superb case, feels like part of the phone, yet has the added protection, top quality feel and professional look.......a case you will be proud to have others notice!

column10: I bought this and the Apple leather case.  I like the look of this one better.  This one also seems to offer a lot more protection.  In the past I've never used a screen protector, but after seeing my wife's last phone being scratched by her earrings(she talks on it constantly), I decided to try one.  I got the Tech Armor. I'm very picky when it comes to phone cases, and I generally opt for Spigen's minimalist models.  In fact, this is the most 'robust' phone case I've ever used, but I have to tell you, I am much impressed.  In fact, I dig this thing, totally.I use my phone when I cycle, and this case is what I should have always been using.  It offers very nice protection, but it's not ridiculously HUGE.  And the other big thing is the built in 'buttons'.  The tactile quality of these make it easy for me to adjust volume while the phone is riding along in my jersey pocket.  And while I thought the size would bother me, I find it to be just fine.  It does make the phone 'bulkier', but if I'm in an office environment or wearing business attire and I want it to be a little sleeker (which is rare), it's quick to remove.  I like that, because there are times when it's nice to admire the phone for the nice design and finish, and perhaps I'm in a professional environment where a more subtle appearance and size is preferable.  It's too risky to leave a case off for me (hiking, running, cycling, grandkids) so I'm finding this case is the best for my needs; I used to select something that was a compromise when it came to true protection (other than scratches and mild nocking around).  Again, I have to say, the size doesn't bother me because it's so well designed; the edges are just right, the finish is grippy where it should be, smooth the same.  I've ribbed my friends for years about their gigantic Otter Box cases, and this little dumplin' catches there attention like right now!I did have to shave the rubber from around the jack on my Shure headphones so they would fit, but it didn't harm them a bit, and it allows me to use this case!  Just not a big deal to me; no compromise at all.  Couple of minutes with a sharp blade, and it was done.I have the black Iphone 5, and I bought the white/black model of this, and it gets a LOT of comments.  The finish seems quite durable and so far shows no signs of wear after about 2 months of daily use.I've always been very impressed with Spigen's products, but I have to say, this is my favorite one. Back tends to scratch quite easily. Otherwise, its a fine case. Short lip around front. Buttons aren't difficult to activate like some other plastics, and feels good in the hands.
Good case for the money.  Thought it might be a little heavier and thicker with using words like armor in it but overall does the job well.

I have tried many, MANY cases for my iPhone 5. This one is one of two or three favorites that I constantly use (the other two are the MagPul Field case and the OtterBox Commuter). Of those three, I think I like the Spigen the best. The build quality is top-shelf. The phone fits tightly with no in-case play. It has just enough grip, but slides in and out of pocket easily...no lint magnet either. Well worth the money.
This is a Otterbox KILLER, awsome case, Best case ever, I always love spigen cases, good quality case, I definetly recommend this case...thanks SPIGEN for your WORK..

This is a well fitting case that has a sturdy protective feel to it as well. The buttons work great, however, like most cases, this one still does not have the correct opening on the bottom to allow a lightning to 30pin adapter to fit without removing the case. I managed to cut the opening with an exacto knife to make it work. I can't understand why the manufacturer could not provide that feature in the design.

column9: Best Iphone 5s case I have ever owned
column10: Elegant. Strong. Sexy...no, not me...This awesome iphone 5s case. Great price. Perfect fit for 5s.  The seller sent promptly. A reviewer mentioned the sharp edges. I disagree. Well made.

column9: Great case for the money, size, and style
column10: I had a Speck case before, and it protected my iPhone very well.  I have dropped my iPhone at least 20 times and never a problem.  I needed to replace it with something more sophisticated for my new job.  I wanted something that was classy, and protected my iPhone from my butter fingers, but didn't add extra bulk.  I was really surprised that this case is exactly the same thickness as my Speck case was.  It looks and feels very solid and well made.  I can tell it will hold up well to abuse.  It adds surprisingly little bulk to the phone for the protection it provides.  And it looks classy, even sophisticated. I like the dark blue a lot.  The buttons are very easy to push, the bottom lets through the sound, and the lightning connector has a lot of space next to it.Two things I don't like about it probably won't bother most buyers.  I don't like cases that put a hole to reveal the Apple logo.  I like the iPhone as a tool, I don't want to be perceived as a fanboy! The hole makes the design look kind of clunky and awkward, and mars the nice lines of the case.  I may have to put a sticker on on the logo to get rid of that. Secondly, I use an Apple 30 pin to lightning adapter on my bedside dock, and the case won't fit that.  However, most cases won't fit that, it might be an unreasonable request.Added 11/21/13: As others have mentioned the colored plastic back of the case is susceptible to scratches.  I saw noticeable scratches within a week of use.  It mars the otherwise fine design of this case. There should be some kind of scratch resistant coating on it.

I order screen protectors and case for iPhone 5s. The wrong screen protector was sent to me. The case is very sleek however and I love it. And then the company realized the mistake , apologized, shipped me my original product in priority mail and included a free case . The screen protector is excellent and installs well

Great case for the cost. It looks very nice on the phone. Volume and power buttons work really well no issues when having to push them. Adds that extra protection that I need without adding very much bulk to the phone. I don't care for the hole cut out on the back for the apple logo but what are you going to do? I've already dropped it once from waist high and everything held up. The case still looks fine and the phone was undamaged. So it does what it is supposed to do with out breaking the bank.

This case is great.  It's not bulky but feels like it will provide good protection.  I have already dropped the phone (with case) once and there was no sign of damage to the case or phone.  I'm not willing to keep dropping it for additional review.  Some reviews complain about the hard edges on this case, but I actually like that.  It makes the case feel a little more industrial just like the iPhone design itself.

I just bought my iPhone 5s and needed something to keep it protected, all while keeping the lowest profile possible. This case does just that! I haven't dropped my phone and I hope I never will, so as of right now I can't attest for the drop protection, but from the feel of it I believe it would do a wonderful job. The only downside I could probably tell people is that there isn't a protective screen for the Apple logo. Not at all a deal breaker, but it would be nice. I just bought some cheap screen protectors and that did the trick. I never did like Otterbox's because of their bulky-ness (is that a word?) This case is WAY smaller and just feels solid.Would I recommend? YES!
This Spigen case fits the iPhone 5s perfectly and Spigen customer support is top notch! Thanks for a case that provides peace of mind! We love the screen protectors too!
The Tough Armor case fits great and looks good too. The Spigen case is a quality product. I would recommend to anyone buying a 5s.

column9: thin and comfortable, better than Otterbox
column10: I really like the Spigen Tough Armor case as it is thin and comfortable to hold.  It definitely less bulky than the Otterbox.  I'm glad that I decided to give a Spigen a try.
In my opinion....This this THE BEST iPhone 5/s case yet!!!If you don't have it yet...BUY IT!You will LOVE IT :)

column9: The SP in Spigen isn't for speedy
column10: I ordered this eight days ago -- in stock, then and now. It has yet to ship! (Doesn't show any delay, either.) In a world of a vast number of quality iPhone cases, obviously this is not the manufacturer to purchase one from.---Update: My order went unprocessed because (1) the item changed from 'Ships from and Sold by Spigen' to 'Sold by Spigen Fulfilled by Amazon,' and (2) the other part of my order 'SPIGEN iPhone 5S Case Slim **NEW Release** [Ultra Fit A]' was removed on Amazon -- page no longer exists.I did finally receive both cases, and while I am displeased with the Tough Armor's $3.79 price drop that occurred in the interim, I am pleased by its quality.  As far as design, the urBeats fit into the headphone jack, no problem.  I haven't tried using Apple's Lightning to 30-pin adapter with it, but that is why I bought the other Spigen case (although, BEWARE: That model appears in photos to have a black cutout around the flash, and it does not. The cutout is white).So, while the Tough Armor product is good (better than Otterbox's Commuter case, in my opinion), I wish I could say the same about the company between its price fluctuations on Amazon (which differ vastly from its site), and its not only changing the fulfillment but also removing a product from the site midstream, along with misrepresenting the design in photos.NOTE: The Steinheil Ultra Crystal Screen Protector offered at 50% off with this purchase is a good deal.  That particular screen protector is excellent!

Stylish and Functional.  The Case looks and feels great.  Nice slim form factor and also has nice protective attributes.  My hunt for another case for my iPhone 5 has officially ended!  My previous case before this was the Otterbox Commuter which was nice too but the Spigen case is overall sleeker and feels better in hand.
The case has some cushion without a lot of bulkiness. I think this will provide adequate protection. I'm glad I made the purchase.
Love love love this case, it does everything that I want it to. I will be buying another one from this company very soon

This is my first iPhone (therefore, my first iPhone case).  I've heard all about the OtterBox, and have seen the OtterBox in use by several friends.  OtterBoxes I've seen are a bit bulkier than most iPhone cases, but with their advertisement of protection from drops and what-nots to the iPhone, I can accept their bulkiness.Then comes Spigen's Tough Armor.  They advertise drop protection, along w/ a slim fit case, which makes the total size of the phone 1.4x bigger [than the standalone iPhone], vs OtterBoxe's 2.1x.  Not only that, but Spigen also touts their Spider Web Pattern TPU, which supposedly allows better air circulation (dissipating heat).  Prior to purchasing this case (I had my phone naked for several days), it would get warm to touch (but of course, all of my phones have done so), while watching video, or playing games.  In similar situations, the case seems to absorb, and dissipate the heat, as I have not felt it get as warm.Tough Armour also advertises their air cushion technology in the corners, allowing the case to absorb more impact from a fall.  Thankfully, I have yet to drop my phone, but I have high hopes in the air cushion absorbing powers.The buttons are nice, and doesn't seem to require more pressure in order to depress.Overall, I've been very pleased w/ my case, and truly have no regrets regarding my purchase.  Hopefully they will continue to make outstanding products.Oh yeah, and a nice bonus, for those who truly care about your iPhone status - there is a cutout in the back (as shown in the picture), which allows all to see that you are in the elite iPhone coterie.

The case looks great and fits Iphone 5s perfectly. It is slim enough to fit in my pocket with no problem. Order was placed on a Saturday with 2 day shipping. I was notified Saturday evening order was being shipped and it arrived on Monday.

I recieved the phone case within a few days and it fits my I phone 5 perfectly!! It has a nice grip, is slim and much more attractive than the otter box. Not sure if it is of same quality as far as protecting the phone but i like it.
This metal slate case goes fantastic with the iphone 5s grey.  Tough, sleek, thin, and durable.  This is everything you want from a case.

A great case.  Its made of nice material, seems very durable and does not make the phone bulky. I would recommend this case to anyone trying to get a case for the occasional accidental drop but not looking to over bulk their pockets.
Great build quality and fits perfectly. The material is smooth and feels great in the hand, adds a good amount of protection. Doesn't add a lot of bulk. I'm happy.

I recently upgraded from an iPhone 4S to an iPhone 5S. I tried many cases for my 4S in hopes of finding a durable case that didn't add a lot of bulk but I never had much luck. After getting my new 5S I bought the SPIGEN Tough Armor Case and I can honestly say I will never need another case! This case is AWESOME!! It provides great protection while adding very little bulk; in fact, it actually feels like it's part of the phone. I know that doesn't sound realistic but the way the case is designed it really does feel that solid. I am truly impressed with this case and can't say enough positive things about it. If you want a solid, protective case without adding a ton of bulk - get this!! You will be very happy you did! And you can't beat the price for what you get.
Thin and provides a fair degree of protection to the phone.  A compromise between good protection and light weight/thin case.  Pretty much what I was looking for.

I have tried just about every case out there for the iPhone 5 and this is my favorite so far.  It is well made, but not too bulky.  Has a really good feel to it while texting or making a call.  Very happy with it and highly recommend it.

A lot of people will say "Get a Life Proof." Well I don't want to buy a $80 case. This case has a lots of protection and is well worth the $30, it doesn't have a screen protector but it's still a very nice case.

This case is pretty much everything I want in a phone case. It's thin, it's sleek and it has a rubbery interior that also come up over the face of the phone to protect it from falls or getting the screen scratched. I haven't dropped my phone yet, so I can't say how well it actually protects the phone. It seems pretty durable, but if I drop my phone, I'll update my review and report if it actually does a good job protecting my iPhone 5.
The case is well made a worth the price. Nicest iPhone case to date. Easy to take off when a cleaning to the phone is required.

column9: Definitely protects phone but the backing is already peeling from the case?
column10: I was very impressed with the shipping speed and how well the case protects by 5s.  Much slimmer than the Otterbox case.  The Satin Silver backing is peeling away from the case already.  I have only been using it for one day so if it gets worse I will have to contact Spigen directly.  My husband has the Gunmetal one and is very pleased.

This case seems very sturdy but does have it's drawbacks. It will not connect to my 30 pin to lightning adapter (which I believe the product description said it would) and it will not dock with my iHome. If you have either of these products or plan on buying them, I would advise against this case since you have to remove your phone from the case to use these items.

I received my case pretty quickly and it was simple to put it one and I love the slim design, only reason why I only gave it 3 stars is because I don't think there is enough front screen is protected enough.  That's my only worry or dislike about this case..
The case was very easy to install. It looks great on my iPhone 5S. Ver thin and lightweight yet appears very durable.
I love this case, it has good protection and not as bulky as otter box cases.  The back looks a little cheap but I love everything else about it

I bought this case for my brand new iPhone 5s. Every time a new phone comes out, I get weary about buying a new case as I've had many that didn't fit over the years. I had some belkin silicone cases that I was using for the time being, and then I found this one and gave it a shot.I will admit, I have been a longtime otterbox faithful and making this purchase was difficult for me. However, I'm happy to report back that I may never buy another ottberbox case again. This case is an absolute home run.Pros:Very studry. I have absolutely nothing but confidence in the protection this case offersIt allows me to make use of the fingerprint sensorFits the 5s perfectlyGreat color match for the space gray phoneCons:Shipping took a little longer than usual because it was originally out of stock, but that's to be expected with a new product.I will update in a few months as I typically break phones quickly being a clutz. But I have no doubt this case will protect my phone just as well as any of my various otterboxes did.
Looks amazing, I love the white shell in conjunction with the white iPhone. Throws otter box out of the water, no questions asked.

This case look and feels awesome. Getting the phone in the case was cake. Before switching to this brand I used Speck. I will never go back to Speck because their cases would show ever little scratch and the rubber would dry rot. But with spigen no scratches have shown up after 2 weeks use, everyone complements me on it and it feels like a quality case not some cheap piece of crap.

Got this for my 5S. Obviously won't use the home button stickers because of the fingerprint scanner. Kind of wish the case had a little more of a textured grip but really that is more of an opinion than a complaint. Haven't dropped it yet but this definitely money we'll spent and for a great price too.
Just received this case and threw it on my 5s and its perfect, snug and very protective. It is a very sleek case, but also built to take some hits. I enjoy this product, glad I purchased it

I bought an iPhone 5s the other day when they came out and used it for a couple days before this case arrived. The iPhone 5s is so thin that without a case I find it hard to hold and a little slippery. The case arrived quickly and it fits like a glove. I really like how the case is small and fits the phone perfectly. It also makes the phone much easier to hold on to. I set my phone next to my wife's 4s with her otter case and its half the size (thickness). I would highly recommend this case to anyone else.

this is the best case I have ever owned for my iphone. I have owned every iphone since they came out and everyone had a otter box but decide to try something different for my 5s and what a dream! nice to hold, fits in front pocket very easy and protects the iphone great and phone case does feel like a brick like the otter box. was so nice order another one for my wife's 5s
Case fits perfectly and feels extremely well built!! I would definitely recommend this case!! I have already dropped my iPhone already with no damage to the device.

column9: Exactly what I had hoped for!
column10: This is a great looking and very we'll constructed case. Have had it on for about a month now and am still very satisfied with how it's holding up to the wear and tear of working in the construction business. Would recommend to a friend.

So far so good.  It is thinner than my other cases, which is why I bought it.  The only downfall is that it is a little slick.  That is good for going in and out of my pocket, but sometime it gets a little slippery in my hand or riding in the car center console.

Nifty case, but still has somewhat sharp edges that I think can be softened. The size is perfect and easily fits in my pocket. Also appears sturdy and should provide all the protection needed from a carrying case.
Light weight, fits phone well but I haven't dropped the phone, yet; so I can't really comment on how well it protects.
Fits extremely well! Looks great on my gold phone. And the rubber corners make me feel the iphone protected! A bit costly but oh well!

Zero star if I could really....I thought that I could live with it since it was given to me, but 2 days of it is enough for me. The square buttons and edges are really ugly, destroying the beautifully designed phone.  It's too masculine.  Also, I don't want to see what it would look like in one week since I've got so many scratches already in the last 2 days.

column9: Best case out there for iPhone 5/5S!
column10: Really a superb case, feels like part of the phone, yet has the added protection, top quality feel and professional look.......a case you will be proud to have others notice!

This case it absolutely great. It handles drops well and the metal on the back is so smooth and great to the touch. The outer plastic/rubber edge it good to the touch as well and it pushes buttons well once you get used to it.I would def recommend this case!!

column9: I'm protective about the cases I use!
column10: I was looking for a great looking, tough case for my new iPhone 5s - found it. Overall, I'm not giving it 5 stars primarily because of the scratches on the metal back plate to the case that show up pretty easily from everyday use and even on inserting and removing from the leather case I bought. Other than the scuffs, this is a great little case. I'm generally a bit clutzy with my phone so I do tend to drop it on any number of surfaces. It has hit concrete, blacktop, desks, chairs, gym floors, and a few other surfaces, with nary a scratch on the phone itself. It's thin enough that it fits great inside a suit jacket packet or pocket of any pants. I don't use a screen protector and never have. I always just look for a case with a lip high enough to provide protection. This does that job well. The camera lens cut-out works great and never seems to impede the dual flash on my iPhone 5s. I love the space gray look to this case that does a pretty good job of replicating what's beneath it on the phone itself.
Great case. I highly recommend this over the otter box. It is not to thick in the pocket it's just right.
the case is just as good looking as it is in the pictures. it feels like great protection also.thanks for making a superior product.

i've only had the cover for a week and the back is already scratched up because I guess at some point my keys were next to it in my purse for maybe an hour. it looks great and so far has protected the phone well - just wish it had been more durable. i had my otterbox for 20 months and it looked brand new the whole time.

I've had the black case for my white phone a week now and it looks great! Came with the black white and orange jelly home buttons, but the black jelly button really pops with the white phone. Sleek, slim and not bulky like the Otter case. I replaced a Slim Armor with this and it feels even lighter and slimmer THAN the Slim Armor. I just need to make sure I don't pull the phone in and out of my back pocket too much cuz the bottom front rubber piece looks like its the weakest part of the case and may stretch in time.

column9: The Best Case for the Iphone 5S
column10: I am a case fanatic, and I am always changing them out because the are too bulky or the color is not right. This case went on with a snap. Perfect fit, nice and snug. Not a large footprint like the Otterbox, and it still allows the iphone5S  to feel slim and smooth. The texture is nice so it's not slick, and it looks great. I'm leery now that somebody will try and steal it. It's that sharp looking. Spigen is the bomb! Buy it....you won't regret it.

Just got my product today and it looks absolutely amazing. It feels like it belongs with the iPhone 5s and fits perfectly. It's durable, slim, and unlike some of the other cases, it looks nice. It's priced reasonably low and is defiantly a 'must-buy' for your iPhone. Interested to see how the case will hold up when it's dropped (though I'm not willing to try that.) Great buy.

I purchased this case for my new 5s. I previously went through two Otterbox Commuters with my 4s and the rubber sleeve became stretched and distorted over time, so was looking for an alternative.This case fits like a glove and feels solid in the hand. It feels strong enough to protect but is not bulky. The volume and power buttons are covered and they respond perfectly when pressed, giving great tactile response. I also bought an Amazon Basics USB-lightning charger cable, which has a slightly wider plug on the lightning end and was afraid it might night connect properly. However, the case power cutout is wide enough to accommodate, so no problem there.All around, a good case that I'd recommend.

My brain wants to tell me this can't protect my phone like an Otter Box. It's slim and lightweight and I'm not about to drop my phone to test it. If, or when, a drop occurs I'll hope the case does the job. Until then I'm going to appreciate the fact that I can still fit the phone in my pocket, the cover comes off and goes on with almost no effort and it allows me to use the thumbprint reader where most other shockproof cases won't.

This is a very good case for the iphone 5s. I bought the metal slate color for my 32gb black space grey 5s. Was weary of purchasing since I use  to use a Otterbox Defender(supreme protection but too bulky)  for my Iphone 4.  Buy the Spigen clear/ultra clear screen protector to go with this and youre good to go. Great protection and still provide sleek look. Highly recommend.

Why 5 stars? Simple. It provides a good protection to your phone without adding the extra bulk that other cases add. So, if you are looking to protect your investment but do not want to hide the beauty of your phone, this is the case to get.
